Articles.Content:
I've lurked and faded in-n-out for a while. I don't play KSP very often, because when I do, multiple days can disappear while I'm frolicking in various orbits.

I'm a frustrated aerospace engineer working a tech support job at a leet computer company, and I came to KSP to burn rocket fuel and chew bubblegum, and I'm all out of bubblegum.

Welcome to the forums, Alpinwolf!

KSP can be very addicting, I am playing since 0.8 and i have a lot of hours put into KSP.

I usually drink something while i'm playing, works better than bubblegum (for me).
